description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. While discrediting the apocalyptic Mayan prophecy, Serena Silva discovers a Mayan temple filled with ancient stone robots protecting a prophecy of their own. She’ll need to orchestrate the animalistic abilities within these ancient robots: peacock turns, rabbit jumps, dingo digs, and jaguar dashes, to uncover the temple’s secret in this physics-based puzzle platformer.
description.short: While discrediting the apocalyptic Mayan prophecy, Serena Silva discovers a Mayan temple filled with ancient stone robots protecting a prophecy of their own. She’ll need to orchestrate the animalistic abilities within these ancient robots: peacock turns, rabbit jumps, dingo digs, and jaguar dashes, to uncover the temple’s secret in this physics-based puzzle platformer.
